reviewtext: The dern thing is almost TOO quiet. Just intalled 2 of them raid 1. I can't tell when they're spinning. WOW!If you are installing in an older pc, like me, that doesn't support sata 3.0, you will need a jumper (not included) to change to sata 1.5.
summary: quiet as a church mouse / jumper 3.0 vs 1.5
